arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher brands Wolves star a 'lucky boy' after escaping a red card for high challenge that left Man City's Bernardo Silva writhing in agony
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher felt Wolves full back Rayan Ait-Nouri was very fortunate to avoid being sent off in his side's 1-0 defeat at Manchester City.

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne goal edges Man City closer to Champions League qualification
